title: Ep156 Cartel Crimes
description: This week, the gals work their connections to untangle some greedy group efforts. Topics include avocado mayhem, the problems behind a girl's best friend, and the aptly named "Highway of Death." Slam a glass (or bottle) of Far + Wide Zweigelt, consider lab-grown, and tune in for Cartel Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
itunes:summary:
This week, the gals work their connections to untangle some greedy group efforts. Topics include avocado mayhem, the problems behind a girl's best friend, and the aptly named "Highway of Death."
